entities.name: curtains
entities.description: The curtains at the windows were all closed.

entities.name: lamps
entities.description: The many lamps were draped with dark red scarves.

entities.name: fire
entities.description: A fire was burning under the crowded mantelpiece.

entities.name: kettle
entities.description: The fire heated a large copper kettle.

entities.name: feathers
entities.description: The shelves were crammed with dusty-looking feathers.

entities.name: candles
entities.description: The shelves were crammed with stubs of candles.

entities.name: playing cards
entities.description: The shelves were crammed with many packs of tattered playing cards.

entities.name: crystal balls
entities.description: The shelves were crammed with countless silvery crystal balls.

entities.name: teacups
entities.description: The shelves were crammed with a huge array of teacups.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The class assembled around them, all talking in whispers.

entities.name: Professor Trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney moved into the firelight.

relationships.description: The fire heated a large copper kettle.
A voice came suddenly out of the shadows, and Professor Trelawney spoke to Harry.
A voice came suddenly out of the shadows, and Professor Trelawney spoke to Ron.
